page.title: 12An interview with the Vicar
page.content: {Mr Taylor}is the {vicar}of both{ {Howden-le-Wear}and{Witton-le-Wear}.He became a vicar in{1973}.He thought God wanted him to become a vicar so he went to college to learn about{The {Bible,the church and what a vicar {does}.After that the{Bishop of {Lichfield}thought it was right for him to become a vicar so he held an{ {ordination}.When someone becomes a vicar in the Church of England they are first of all made a{deacon ,}and then made a{priest}.This is done at a sevice called ordination, where we ask God to help the deacon or priest to do their work for him. In his spare time he plays with his children or goes for walks, reads books and listens to records.
